## Generating the ARD

### For R

For R use the siera package

- Motivation: [www.cdisc.org: 360i-Program-Kickoff20250218](https://www.cdisc.org/sites/default/files/pdf/360i-Program-Kickoff20250218.pdf)

![Software Tools Since CDISC 360 POC](tools.jpg)

- [siera](https://cosa.cdisc.org/directory/siera)
  - If ARS data is not in JSON format - **convert ARS Data** to JSON
